scripts.u-all: yarn u-encore && yarn u-gulp && yarn u-snowpack && yarn u-webpack
scripts.i-all: yarn i-encore && yarn i-gulp && yarn i-snowpack && yarn i-webpack
scripts.b-all: yarn b-encore && yarn b-gulp && yarn b-snowpack && yarn b-webpack
scripts.l-all: yarn l-encore && yarn l-gulp && yarn l-snowpack && yarn l-webpack
scripts.l-encore: cd encore && yarn link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.l-gulp: cd gulp && yarn link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.l-snowpack: cd snowpack && yarn link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.l-webpack: cd webpack && yarn link xtendui && cd ..
